title: Looking for people to play with, Casuel or ranked.
body:
So Im just looking at finding some peeps to play LoL with in normals or ranked. Im not exactly an amazing player, but Im trying to learn a few champs so I get start maining them for ranked. :D
Or if you feel like just breaking the meta in normals and having fun, I would also love that! Mostly just want people to communicate with in game instead of needing to ping to get a team fight going haha. (my rank is Silver V, but I honestly think my skill is of bronze somewhere.)
Skype or some other voice program is kinda a must. gotta be able to chat! :D

replies.body: Hey my duo buddy and I would be down to play :) I main mid and supp and he mains jungle. We mostly play URF now because let's face it who doesn't but I don't mind going back to norms. I must warn you I am rusty because after not playing for like 2 weeks I went straight into URF so...

I accepted your friend requst. sounds good! Support and Top are where I normally chill.
Trying to top more often than not these days though.
And thats fine, rusty is good, means I wont look like total shit haha. :P
And urf ftw.
Sick attitude dude. Added for sure! I'll message you my Skype/Curse when you accept.
Thanks man! Can't wait! But yeah, gotta have fun when you're playing a game. :D
